name: Turn Off The Light (itch)
description:
One day when You were hiking in an old forest you fell into a hole and find yourself in an old dungeon . by reversing the gravity and turning the light On and Off , find your way out of this dangerous dungeon and save yourself.

Turn Off The Light is a short Puzzle, Platformer game that i made in 4 days for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3 . this was the first game jam that i participated and i got short on time and the game ended up shorter than i wanted to be.

Controls:

left and right arrow keys  |  move

Space | Jump

Z  | reverse the gravity

X  | turn off the light

by the way, there is a bug that make the character stuck to the ground (specially in between two level). if that happened to you jumping while moving should solve the problem.

I will probably add more levels to the game later
